apps.label: Launch
apps.tooltip: Open the application inside the desktop workspace.

apps.label: Details
apps.tooltip: View this application in the app catalog.

settings.label: Open
settings.tooltip: Jump directly to this setting panel.

settings.label: Section
settings.tooltip: Open the broader section that contains this setting.

files.label: Open
files.tooltip: Open the file explorer to this location.

files.label: Copy path
files.tooltip: Copy the file path to the clipboard.

files.label: Preview
files.tooltip: Open the file in a new browser tab.

commands.label: Run
commands.tooltip: Send the command to the terminal app.

commands.label: Copy
commands.tooltip: Copy the command to the clipboard.

help.label: Open
help.tooltip: Open the help article in a new tab.

help.label: Copy link
help.tooltip: Copy the article URL to the clipboard.
